channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan's Consumer Price Index Hits Seasonally Adjusted 9-Month Low
item.description: Taiwan's consumer price index hit a seasonally adjusted nine-month low in April, despite higher electricity prices.

item.title: Taiwan's Military Preps Cannons for '21-Gun Salute' Ahead of Inauguration
item.description: Soldiers in New Taipei City are getting ready to perform one of the oldest military traditions, the 21-gun salute, ahead of President-elect Lai Ching-te's inauguration on May 20.

item.title: Search Continues for German Academic Missing After Hualien Earthquake
item.description: Authorities are still searching for a German academic last seen in Taroko National Park days before it was struck by a major earthquake at the start of last month.

item.title: Cross-Border Crime Ring in Taiwan Sparks Security Concerns
item.description: Seven Taiwanese nationals are being prosecuted for their role in a cross-border document forging ring.
